thread.title: The Training Associates Continues Growth Trajectory: Sarah Lindberg Joins as Director of Learning & Development

author: cnbc.com
title: The Training Associates Continues Growth Trajectory: Sarah Lindberg Joins as Director of Learning & Development
text:
BOSTON & WESTBOROUGH, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Training Associates (TTA), a recognized global leader for Learning & Development talent and solutions, today announced that Sarah Lindberg has joined as the company’s Director of Learning & Development.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180308006017/en/
Sarah Lindberg, Director of Learning & Development at The Training Associates (Photo: Business Wire).
“The depth and breadth of expertise that Sarah brings to The Training Associates has had an immediate impact on our clients’ learning programs,” said Andrea Turner, Senior Vice President of Learning and Engagement at The Training Associates. “Her ideas and, more importantly, her passion to design creative, scalable, and measurable Learning & Development rubrics will literally guide thousands of corporate learners throughout 2018.”
Lindberg began working in Learning & Development as a National Sales Trainer for the Tony Robbins’ Companies. As one of Robbins’ dedicated motivational speakers, Lindberg was introduced to hundreds of companies, guiding their C-suite, HR, and training executives through the strategies and tactics of workforce learning. For the next 18 years, Lindberg developed learning programs for Wells Fargo, Medica Health Insurance, and Gillette Children’s Specialty Healthcare.
In addition to her 18 years of Learning & Development expertise as part of an internal team, Lindberg has a keen business background developed through contracting arrangements and positions held at nationwide companies in a variety of industries.
ABOUT THE TRAINING ASSOCIATES
An award-winning innovator, The Training Associates is a recognized global leader for Learning & Development (L&D) talent and solutions. Organizations of all sizes, including Fortune 500 corporations, rely on The Training Associates’ agility to support their L&D initiatives of any size or scope across all training modalities.
Our strength lies in our adaptive workforce of 25,000 L&D professionals combined with our expertise to provide organizations with customized, scalable training solutions, and engaging learner experiences. TheTrainingAssociates.com
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180308006017/en/
